Articles.Content:
Greetings everyone,

How would you like a Career mode with Space Race in it, like trying to be ahead of some other Kerbal country? Trying to orbit before them and all... I know that what will have not isn't the full game, and also Career is work in progress, but don't you think this would be a cool idea for the future?(maybe a mod...)

P.s. This is my very first thread in these forums, so be sure to tell me if there's something wrong
Millions before you asked for that. The answer as far as I know is not gonna happen.

I think that would warrant a separate setting. When you start a career save, you get a check box where it says space race. If you check it, it does like what you say. You have to beat another country or else perhaps your get less reputation, less money and science (?).

That said I cannot find a statement by Devs as to a definitive yes or no.

Welcome to the forums!

But yeah it has been said many times before even I said that once! It might be the making of a mod one day but at this point I don't see it.
Sorry for asking this again - I couldn't find such a topic on the forums... So no definitive answer for this one?
With multiplayer possibly in the works, there is no reason you can't challenge your friends to one, even if the full game doesn't come with an AI space program.
